title: hostmaria
author: hostmaria
content: https://i.imgur.com/hjFNqvh.jpegYou are welcome to attend an independent cryptocurrency meetup "London Whale", network with people interested in cryptocurrencies & see the NFT exhibition of Mx12LevinsAbout this eventType: in-person meetup for everyone who is interested in cryptocurrency or blockchain technologies.Name: "London Whale"Dates: 4th and 5th July, 2022Price: FreeLocation: Yum-Sa, East-Putney, LondonWe will also have a special guest an early cryptoartist Mx12Levins and this will be a rare chance to see a NFT exhibition in London. Some of his NFTs are older than cryptopunks and stones. https://twitter.com/Mx12LevinsThere will be a Talk Room, the scheduler will be planned and announced early next week.There will be also a Q&A session by a Bitcoin Maximalist https://github.com/kristapsk if your only interest is $BTC.--We are looking for a crowd of 300+ people to visit us over this 2-day event.Note: there will be no fiat accepted at the Venue Place. Please prepare your mobile wallets, or stay thirsty.To find out more information about the London Whale event, please visit https://whale.london---Exhibitor List:NFT artist Mx12LevinsNFT artist Amrita Panesar - "Drunk Doctors"StakeCube.comPowerMining.ioInternational Academy of WealthDogeCashVendible - vendiblelabs.com.. list to be updatedAt the moment, there are 4 FREE exhibitor spaces available >> 2x NFT artist tables (10 & 11) and 2x large lounges (5 & 6). Approval will be given on a first-come, first-served basis (too many time-wasters)https://i.imgur.com/keuEHSI.jpeg---Organiser: No Stress Ltd / Email: hello@whale.london / Tel/WhatsApp: +447494142055---Event location: Yum-Sa, 3 Plaza Gardens, 88 Upper Richmond Road, Putney, SW15 2D, London, UKhttps://i.imgur.com/AivRwEm.jpeghttps://i.imgur.com/tfQoJNZ.jpeg---Any questions?
